Package com.example.librarian_module.sys

Class Account

java.lang.Object
com.example.librarian_module.sys.Account
public class Account extends Object
The class Account manages user accounts to control access to different functionality of the library system. Each account is assigned different access level defining the operations that user are authorized to perform. An account that has been inactive for a specific time period will be automatically logged out.
Since:
2022-03-04

    Class

    static enum 
    Account.AccessLevel
    The enum class AccessLevel defines the access level of different type of actors in the library system.
    static enum 
    Account.LoginStatus
    The enum class LoginStatus defines the status of a login operation.

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account()
      Create an empty user account object.

    • Account

      public Account(String uid, String pwd, Account.AccessLevel lvl)
      Create a user account object with the specified user ID, password, and access level. Creating the object does not mean it has been added to the library system.
      Parameters:
      uid - User ID used as the key of the account.
      pwd - Password used to log in the account.
      lvl - Access level of the account.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public static Account.LoginStatus login(String uid, String pwd)
      Log in a user with the specified user ID and password.
      Parameters:
      uid - User ID used as the key of the account.
      pwd - Password used to log in the account.
      Returns:
      An enum type LoginStatus representing the result of the login operation.

    • logout

      Log in a user with the specified user ID.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
